type: HIGHLY COMPETITIVE SERVICES OF PHYSIO TREATMENT FOR DETAINEES IN QUEBEC REGION
short_summary: The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is procuring physiotherapy services for all its institutions in the Quebec region.
description: The CSC wishes to obtain physiotherapy services to provide essential physiotherapy treatments and services to offenders referred by Health Services professionals according to the standards of the Ordre professionnel de la physiothérapie du Québec. The physiotherapy services are required at institutions from Quebec region. [Summary Description]
